participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, Emily enjoys connecting with others and is looking forward to new experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older. I enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing. My family is not well off and I wish I could go to a better school. I wish that I lived in the city. I cherish my camera because it allows me to express my creativity.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and a bit quirky, Sarah is proud of her unique interests and enjoys outdoor activities with her pets.
participant_2.background: I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge! I look down on people who did not. I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection. I have never done drugs because I do not know where to buy them. I have two dogs, one pitbull and an old English bulldog.

content.text: Hi, I'm Emily! I'm a 24 y/o who just graduated college. I'm a little nervous about starting my new job, but I'm also excited! How about you?
Hi Emily! My name is Sarah, I'm a 25 y/o who just graduated college as well. I'm also a little nervous about starting my new job, but I'm excited to get started!
What are you going to be doing at your new job?
I'll be working as an administrative assistant for a small law firm. What about you?
I'll be working as a marketing associate for a large corporation.
Oh wow, that sounds like a really exciting job! I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks, Sarah! I think I'm going to be okay.
I'm sure you will be too! So, what are your hobbies?
I love to cook, read, and go out with my friends. What about you?
I love to read, play video games, and go hiking with my dogs.
Oh, I love hiking too! I have two dogs as well, a pitbull and an old English bulldog.
That's awesome! I love pitbulls. I've never had an old English bulldog, but they're so cute!
They are! They're the sweetest dogs ever.
Well, it was nice chatting with you, Emily. We should definitely get together sometime and do something fun!
That sounds like a great idea! I'll give you my number so you can text me
